name: Unknown Item
overview: Trade-off perks have a 15% chance of appearing and provide powerful bonuses with significant drawbacks.
key_features: Each trade-off perk can only be selected once per run
Provide substantial benefits but with major penalties
The benefit for trade-off perks can be increased by upgrading the "Improve Trade-off Perks" lab
The lab does not affect the ranged enemy distance perk
